channel.title: Ethyl's Music Libary
channel.itunes:subtitle: Deep house, downtempo and jazz mixed and compiled by Ethyl
channel.itunes:author: Ethyl
channel.itunes:summary: An upfront selection of deep house with nods to downtempo and jazz, mixed and compiled by Ethyl. For more information and track listings, visit www.ethylmusic.co.uk
channel.description: An upfront selection of deep house with nods to downtempo and jazz, mixed and compiled by Ethyl. For more information and track listings, visit www.ethylmusic.co.uk
channel.itunes:keywords: deep house, dj, house, ethyl, tech, tech house, jazz, deep, club, minimal, mix, underground

item.title: 001-my voice proclaims - 15.09.08
item.itunes:author: Ethyl
item.itunes:summary: The podcast kicks off with a club mix; deep and percussive house with a smattering of keys and vocals from the likes of Nick Curly, Minimono, Kenny Larkin... I will be playing at Home Bar in shoreditch 27th September 2008
item.itunes:keywords: deep house, dj, house, ethyl, tech, tech house, jazz, deep, club, minimal, mix, underground

item.title: 002-Ethyl's Music Library - 19.10.08
item.itunes:author: Ethyl
item.itunes:summary: podcast number 2. an equable selection not without its darker moments. cuts from moodymann, nomumbah, atjazz and nick sole among others. for tracklistings visit www.ethylmusic.co.uk [ethylmusic@gmail.com]
item.itunes:keywords: deep house, dj, house, ethyl, tech, tech house, jazz, deep, club, minimal, mix, underground

item.title: 003-Ethyl's Music Library - 11.11.08
item.itunes:author: Ethyl
item.itunes:summary: a somewhat retrospective mix. downtempo material from the mathew herbert big band and anton zap and darker, disco influenced tracks from, among others, sascha dive, luciano, johnny d, markus fix, miss fitz and bernard badie on mojuba. ethylmusic.co.uk
item.itunes:keywords: deep house, dj, house, ethyl, tech, tech house, jazz, deep, club, minimal, mix, underground

after a bit of a gap...

item.title: 006-Ethyl DJ Set recorded at Fuse @ 93 Feet East- 27.09.09
item.itunes:author: Ethyl
item.itunes:subtitle: Ethyl DJ Set recorded at Fuse @ 93 Feet East- 27.09.09
item.itunes:summary:
Ethyl DJ Set recorded at Fuse @ 93 Feet East- 27.09.09
This is the last hour and a half of my daytime set from Fuse last week on Brick Lane in London.
1. Flori - Sing It On Out 2. Steve O'Sullivan - Soft Scoop Memories [Sushitech] 3. Taron-Trekka - Radio Fligg [Brut] 4. Patrick Specke - Hoola's Dancing [Desolat] 5. Rick Wade - Show U Love [A Touch Of Class] 6. James Duncan - D'Jam [Real Soon] 7. Sten - Urban Savanna [Esperanza] 8. WAX10001 - Track 2 [Wax] 9. Foog - Open Your Eyes [Mule Musiq] 10. DJ Sneak - I Live In Toronto [Magnetic] 11. Mountain People - 008.3 [Mountain People] 12. Ekkohaus - The Flow [2020 Vision] 13. Tom Trago - Passion (MCDE Mix) [Rush Hour] 14. Kenlou - The Bounce [MAW] 15. Headless Ghost - The Journey [STHLM Audio] 16. Jagged - New York [Quintessentials] 17. Iron Curtis - Peoples [Morris Audio] 18. Huch - Travel The Earth (John Daly Mix) [Feel]

item.title: 007-Ethyl DJ Set II - recorded at Fuse @ 93 Feet East, London - 18.10.09
item.itunes:author: Ethyl
item.itunes:subtitle: 007-Ethyl DJ Set II - recorded at Fuse @ 93 Feet East, London - 18.10.09
item.itunes:summary:
My 3 hour set from daytime party Fuse @ 93 Feet East on Brick Lane, London last Sunday 18.10.09. And I promise the reverb sounded more subtle at the venue!
Manmade Science - Get Your Head Up (SoulPhiction Dub) [Philpot] Lerosa - Demon [A Touch Of Class] Theo Parrish - Moonlite [Sound Signature] Martin Hayes - Wasatrain [Mancha] Chaton - Catch The Beat (Agnes Mix) [STHLM Audio] The Zohar - Mean Street [Quintessentials] M:Landsky - Wild Dub [Dessous] Delano Smith - Something For Myself [Third Ear] Slowhouse - Three (A1) [Slowhouse] James Duncan - Times Like These (B1) [Le Systeme] Kuba Sojka - Voice Of Soul [Matrix] Bassmental - 2 Daye Revisit [Nite Grooves] Lazar - House Of The Rising Sun [STHLM Audio] Motor City Drum Ensemble - Raw Cuts 5 [MCDE] Knarf Skipson - Nuff Said [Quintessentials] Anonym - Go Deeper [Sushitech] RibN - Mined [Millions Of Moments] Leon ft. Corrina Joseph - I Follow You (Deetron Springtime Leaves Remix) [Rebirth] Inland Knights - Up The Wall [Drop] Chez Damier - Teach Me, Keep Me [Mojuba] Baaz - Double Talk [Quintessentials] Kasper - Hooked On You [Quintessentials] Paperclip People- Throw [Planet E] Mihai Popoviciu, Markus Homm, Jay Bliss - Bis Co [Diynamic] Norm Talley - The Journey [Third Ear] Roman IV Flügel - 14x7x4 [Playhouse] Makam - New York Hustler [Sushitech Purple] Anton Zap - Basement Groover [Quintessentials] Cesaria Evora - Angola (Carl Craig's Mix) [BMG] Jacksonville - Volante [Doppler] WAX - 10001 (B) [Wax] Ian Pooley - Hippest Hip (Manuel Tur Rework) [Pooled]

item.title: 008-W30 Sessions Radio Show Mix - 23.01.10
item.itunes:author: Ethyl
item.itunes:subtitle: 008-W30 Sessions Radio Show Mix - 23.01.10
item.itunes:summary:
A one hour mix recorded for friend Martin Hayes' W30 Sessions Radio Show. Verging on eclectic. Not aimed at the floor but if you want to move...
Illa J - Sounds Like Love (Carlos Niño and Miguel Atwoods-Ferguson's "in Space Remix") [Delicious Vinyl] The Lady Blacktronica - All These Good Feelings (Dubbyman and Above Smoke Remix) - Cocaine EP [Deep Explorer] Patchworks - Labroke Grove - Vol.2 [Cinnamone] James Duncan - Track 4 - Times Like These [Le Systeme] The Zohar - Getting Down In My Car - Deep Raw and Real Part 2 [Quintessentials] Romanthony and DJ Predator - Music Mind - Instinctual [Glasgow Underground] Nick Lawson - You Look Good [Morris Audio Citysport Edition] Specter - Windtalker - Up To The Surface EP [Deep Explorer] Rick Wade - I Feel Good [Funky Chocolate] Mike 'Agent X' Clark - Let Your Love - Detroit Beatdown Vol.1 [Third Ear] Kez YM - Bridge To Bridge - Butterfly EP [Yore] Traxx - Enka - Faith [Nation]
ethylmusic@gmail.com /// myspace.com/ethylmusic /// soundcloud.com/ethylmusic
item.itunes:keywords: deep house, dj, house, ethel, tech, tech house, secretsundaze, deep, club, minimal, mix, underground

item.title: 009-Ethyl and Flori - recorded at Fuse, London - 14.03.10
item.itunes:author: Ethyl
item.itunes:subtitle: 009-Ethyl and Flori - dodgy recording at Fuse, London - 14.03.10
item.itunes:summary:
Ethyl and Flori b2b @ Fuse, London BIG apologies for the recording, it cuts out intermittently throughout the whole mix but I figured A mix is better than NO mix. Especially miffed because following this it really gathered pace too but the cut outs were getting longer, sometimes entire tracks :(
enjoy, if you can
ethylmusic@gmail.com /// myspace.com/ethylmusic /// soundcloud.com/ethylmusic
item.itunes:keywords: deep house, dj, house, ethel, tech, tech house, secretsundaze, deep, club, minimal, mix, underground

item.title: 011-Ethyl and Flori - Secretsundaze Barcelona - 20.06.10
item.itunes:author: Ethyl
item.itunes:subtitle: 011-Ethyl and Flori - Secretsundaze Barcelona - 20.06.10
item.itunes:summary:
Ethyl and Flori b2b, Secretsundaze Sonar @ La Terrrazza Barcelona The warm up set courtesy of awdio.com from a beautiful day in Barcelona. Before, Trus'me, Jay Shepheard, The Mole, Patrice Scott, James and Giles
for other sets from the day check the agency's soundcloud. soundcloud.com/the-secret-agency
